childContentfulCourseDescriptionTextNode.description:
Like most other like most other things, there are pros and cons. It really depends on the type of person you are. While work from home jobs allow you to have freedom with your schedule, it can also lacks structure. And this can lead to problems with time management and efficiency.

If you are the type of person who has a high level of if you are the type of person who has a high level of self-discipline and ability to focus then work at home will be a pleasant experience. But if you need structure in order to stay on track work-from-home may be a bit of a challenge
